newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Pakistani cotton rates close steady, seen stable.
newsitem.headline: Pakistani cotton rates close steady, seen stable.

text.p: Pakistani cotton rates closed steady on Monday in thin trading in a cash-short market, dealers said.
One dealer said the market was likely to open stable on Tuesday in the absence of demand from big spinners.
In the kerb market, NIAB-78 variety remained stable at 2,390 rupees per maund (37.32 kg), he said.
Monday's Karachi Cotton Association official spot rates in rupees per maund:
